values.title: Marcus Aurelius
values.desc: Dwell on the beauty of life Watch the stars and see yourself running with them

values.title: Oprah Winfrey
values.desc: Be thankful for what you have you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you dont have you will never ever have enough

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them

values.title: Elvis Presley
values.desc: When things go wrong don't go with them

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Dreams don't work unless you take action. The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them

values.title: George Eliot
values.desc: It will never rain roses when we want to have more roses we must plant more roses

values.title: Barack Obama
values.desc: Yes We Can!

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: When you connect to the silence within you that is when you can make sense of the disturbance going on around you

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure

values.title: Mandy Hale
values.desc: Being brave enough to be alone frees you up to invite people into your life because you want them and not because you need them

values.title: Germany Kent
values.desc: Its a funny thing about life once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack

values.title: Ellen DeGeneres
values.desc: It makes a big difference in your life when you stay positive

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Our way of thinking creates good or bad outcomes

values.title: Christian Baloga
values.desc: You say freak, I say unique

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Judgment is a negative frequency

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: When your back is to the wall and you are facing fear head on the only way is forward and through it

values.title: Amit Ray
values.desc: Mind is a flexible mirror adjust it to see a better world

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Success will be within your reach only when you start reaching out for it

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Before you can successfully make friends with others first you have to become your own friend

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: No matter how small you start always dream big

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: It sometimes takes a state of solitude to bring to mind the real power of companionship
